about.title: About 7S Institute
about.content: 7S Institute is a premier technology training hub dedicated to providing industry-standard education in UI/UX Design, Full Stack Development, and AI Research. We focus on hands-on learning and real-world project experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To bridge the gap between education and employment by equipping students with the most in-demand technical skills and professional mindset.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be recognized globally as a center of excellence for technical education and holistic development, creating leaders who contribute positively to society.
